mapper.select: SELECT li.emp_no AS empNo , fo.access_level AS accessLevel , fo.emp_state AS empState , fo.emp_name AS empName , fo.employ_date AS employDate FROM emp_no_list li INNER JOIN emp_info fo ON li.emp_no = fo.emp_no INNER JOIN member_info mem ON fo.emp_no = mem.emp_no WHERE li.emp_no = #{memberId} AND mem.pw = PASSWORD( #{memberPw} );
